userPromptSubmit.command: bash -c "if [[ $(git branch --show-current) == 'main' ]] && [[ '{user_prompt}' == *'/create-spec'* || '{user_prompt}' == *'/execute-tasks'* ]]; then git checkout -b feature/auto-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S) && echo 'Created feature branch automatically'; fi"

bash.command: bash -c "if echo '{command}' | grep -E 'git push.*(origin main|origin master)' > /dev/null; then echo 'âŒ BLOCKED: Direct push to main not allowed. Create a PR instead.'; exit 1; fi"

/status.description: Show current git and project status
/status.command: echo '=== Current Status ==='; git branch --show-current; echo '---'; git status -s; echo '---'; ls -la .agent-os/specs/ 2>/dev/null | tail -5 || echo 'No specs yet'

/cache-stats.command: echo '=== Cache Stats ==='; find .claude/docs/internal -type f -name '*.md' | wc -l | xargs echo 'Cached patterns:'; du -sh .claude/docs 2>/dev/null | cut -f1 | xargs echo 'Cache size:'
